name: 550W Monocrystalline Solar Panel
description: High-efficiency monocrystalline solar panel perfect for residential installations. Features advanced cell technology for maximum power output even in low-light conditions.

name: 5kW Hybrid Solar Inverter
description: Smart hybrid inverter with battery storage capability. Seamlessly switches between solar, battery, and grid power to optimize energy usage and reduce electricity costs.

name: 10kWh Lithium Battery Storage
description: Modular lithium-ion battery system for home energy storage. Stores excess solar energy for use during peak hours or power outages. Expandable design allows for future capacity increases.

name: 400W Polycrystalline Solar Panel
description: Cost-effective polycrystalline solar panel ideal for large-scale installations. Reliable performance with excellent value for money.

name: 8kW String Inverter
description: High-performance string inverter for commercial and large residential solar systems. Features advanced MPPT technology for optimal energy harvest.

name: 5kWh Compact Battery System
description: Space-saving battery storage solution perfect for apartments and small homes. Wall-mountable design with intelligent energy management.
